text: The Barkers is an Australian contemporary folk band formed in 1993. Their album Black Joke was nominated for 1997 ARIA Award for Best World Music Album. ==Members== *Terry Bradford *Richard Tonkin *Stuart Day *Imogen Lidgett *Steve Fleming *Peter Lloyd *James Clark ==Discography== *The Barkers (1995) - Round Records *Black Joke (1996) - Round Records *Woof (1998) - Round Records *Temple Hill - Round Records ==References== Category:Musical groups from Adelaide
title: The Barkers
